entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:32 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
